class_libraries.library:
<class name="control_filters/GravityCompensationWrench" type="control_filters::GravityCompensation" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a gravity compensation filter working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped. It subtracts the influence of a force caused by the gravitational force from force measurements.

<class name="control_filters/LowPassFilter" type="control_filters::LowPassFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a low pass filter working with a double value.
<class name="control_filters/LowPassFilterWrench" type="control_filters::LowPassFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a low pass filter working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped.
